stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Pit digging, soil amendment, and planting layout.

stages.name: Planting & establishment
stages.activities: Plant grafted saplings, staking, and initial irrigation.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Fruit sizing, color break, and harvesting.

fertilizer.basal: FYM 20-30 kg/tree with balanced NPK as per soil test.
top_dressing: Spring: Split N dose to support vegetative growth.
After fruit set: Apply N and K to support fruit development.

stage_wise: Flowering: Maintain soil moisture for good fruit set.
Fruit development: Regular irrigation to avoid stress.
irrigation.notes: Mulching helps conserve moisture and improves fruit quality.

pests.prevention: Prune for air flow, remove infected leaves, and maintain orchard sanitation.

harvest.indicators: Fruit color develops and seeds turn brown.
harvest.post_harvest: Harvest carefully, grade, and pre-cool before storage.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Deep ploughing, pit digging, and basal manure.

stages.name: Planting & establishment
stages.activities: Plant suckers/tissue-culture plants and provide initial irrigation.

stages.name: Shooting & flowering
stages.activities: Support plants, manage pests, and maintain moisture.

stages.name: Bunch filling & harvest
stages.activities: Bagging, irrigation, and harvesting mature bunches.

top_dressing: Monthly splits of N and K from 2-8 months.

stage_wise: Vegetative: Regular irrigation to avoid stress.
irrigation.frequency: Drip 2-5 L/plant/day early, 10-15 L/plant/day at bunch filling.
irrigation.notes: Avoid waterlogging; mulching improves moisture retention.

pests.prevention: Use clean planting material, remove infected plants, and keep field clean.

harvest.indicators: Fingers are full sized with rounded angles.
harvest.post_harvest: Dehand, wash, and cool quickly before transport.

top_dressing: Usually not required; seed inoculation recommended.

pests.prevention: Clean seed, proper spacing, and timely sowing.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry grain to about 12% moisture.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest when pods turn yellow and dry.

top_dressing: Usually not required; seed inoculation recommended.

stage_wise: Pre-sowing: One irrigation if soil is dry.
Flowering/pod filling: 1-2 irrigations if moisture stress occurs.
irrigation.frequency: Low water requirement; irrigate only if needed.

harvest.indicators: Plants turn yellow and pods dry.
harvest.post_harvest: Dry pods, thresh, and store in clean bins.

stages.name: Planting & establishment
stages.activities: Plant seedlings, provide shade and irrigation.

top_dressing: Apply NPK in 2-3 splits per year.

stage_wise: Dry season: Regular irrigation to avoid stress.
irrigation.frequency: 40-60 L/palm/week in dry months or drip irrigation.

pests.prevention: Crown sanitation, pheromone traps, and field hygiene.

harvest.indicators: Mature nuts are brown and firm.
harvest.post_harvest: Store in a ventilated area to avoid mold.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Pit digging, shade regulation, and soil amendment.

stages.name: Planting & establishment
stages.activities: Plant seedlings and provide shade and irrigation.

stages.name: Harvest & processing
stages.activities: Pick ripe cherries and process promptly.

fertilizer.basal: FYM 10-15 t/ha with balanced NPK splits.

stage_wise: Flowering: Blossom irrigation in dry months.
Berry set: Backing irrigation to reduce drop.

harvest.indicators: Cherries turn bright red and firm.
harvest.post_harvest: Pulp, ferment, wash, and dry to safe moisture.

stages.name: Sowing
stages.activities: Seed treatment and sowing with spacing.

irrigation.frequency: 10-15 day interval; shorter in sandy soils.
irrigation.notes: Avoid waterlogging; stress reduces boll set.

harvest.post_harvest: Pick clean, dry before storage.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Fine tilth, bed preparation, and manure application.

stages.name: Sowing/Transplanting
stages.activities: Planting with proper spacing and initial irrigation.

stages.name: Harvest
stages.activities: Harvest at bud or half-bloom stage.

fertilizer.basal: Balanced NPK as per crop and soil test.
top_dressing: Split N and K during vegetative and bud stages.

stage_wise: Flowering: Regular irrigation to maintain quality.

harvest.indicators: Bud or half-bloom stage for longer vase life.
harvest.post_harvest: Cool and hydrate stems quickly.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Pit digging, soil amendment, and layout.

fertilizer.basal: FYM with balanced NPK as per soil test.

harvest.indicators: Color change and firmness as per crop.
harvest.post_harvest: Grade and store in cool conditions.

top_dressing: Split N and K at shoot growth and berry set.

stage_wise: Pre-harvest: Reduce irrigation to improve quality.
irrigation.notes: Avoid excess water near harvest to prevent cracking.

harvest.post_harvest: Pre-cool and pack carefully.
Dry grain to about 12% moisture.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Prepare fine tilth, apply FYM/compost, and ensure good drainage.

stages.name: Nursery/Direct sowing
stages.activities: Transplant seedlings or line sow treated seed at recommended spacing.

stages.name: Vegetative growth
stages.activities: Weeding, gap filling, and first top dressing of nitrogen.

stages.name: Ear emergence & flowering
stages.activities: Maintain moisture and monitor for blast and stem borer.

stages.name: Grain filling & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest when ear heads turn brown and grains are hard.

fertilizer.basal: Apply FYM 5-10 t/ha and N:P:K around 40:20:20 kg/ha (adjust by soil test).
top_dressing: 25-30 DAS: Apply first split of nitrogen.
45-50 DAS: Apply remaining nitrogen split before flowering.
fertilizer.organic: Use compost/FYM and biofertilizers where available.

stage_wise: Establishment: Light irrigation after sowing/transplanting if rainfall is low.
Tillering to flowering: Avoid moisture stress; this is critical stage.
Grain filling: One protective irrigation in dry spell improves yield.
irrigation.frequency: Mostly rainfed; provide 2-4 irrigations during long dry spells.
irrigation.notes: Avoid standing water; ragi performs best in well-drained soils.

pests.prevention: Use resistant varieties, seed treatment, clean field sanitation, and balanced nutrition.

harvest.indicators: Ear heads turn straw-brown and grains become hard.
harvest.post_harvest: Dry harvested ears well, thresh carefully, and store grain below safe moisture.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Fine tilth and raised beds if needed.

stages.name: Sowing
stages.activities: Broadcast or line sowing with thinning.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest at 50% flowering for best fiber.

stage_wise: Mid-season: Irrigate if dry spell occurs.

pests.prevention: Clean field, balanced nutrition, and proper spacing.

harvest.post_harvest: Retting and fiber extraction in clean water.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest when pods dry and brown.

irrigation.notes: Avoid excess moisture to prevent disease.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry grain to about 12% moisture.

stage_wise: Pre-sowing: One irrigation if soil is dry.

harvest.indicators: Pods dry and plants turn yellow.
harvest.post_harvest: Dry and thresh carefully.

stages.name: Sowing
stages.activities: Seed placement 3-5 cm and basal fertilizer.

stage_wise: Grain filling: One irrigation if dry.
irrigation.notes: Moisture stress at silking reduces yield sharply.

pests.prevention: Seed treatment and clean field sanitation.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry grain to 12-13% moisture.

stages.name: Planting & establishment
stages.activities: Plant grafted saplings and provide irrigation.

stages.name: Fruit development & harvest
stages.activities: Nutrient support and harvesting mature fruits.

top_dressing: Apply N and K after flowering.

irrigation.notes: Avoid irrigation just before flowering to induce bloom.

pests.prevention: Pruning, sanitation, and bagging if needed.

harvest.indicators: Shoulders rise and color change appears.
harvest.post_harvest: De-sap, wash, and pack carefully.

stage_wise: Mostly rainfed; one irrigation if long dry spell occurs.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry and store grain safely.

top_dressing: Usually not required; seed inoculation recommended.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry and thresh carefully.

stages.name: Fruit development & harvest
stages.activities: Maintain moisture and harvest at maturity.

irrigation.notes: Excess moisture near harvest reduces sweetness.

harvest.post_harvest: Harvest at full slip stage and handle gently.

stages.name: Fruit development & harvest
stages.activities: Nutrient support and harvesting mature fruits.

top_dressing: Apply N and K after flowering.

harvest.indicators: Uniform color and good juice content.
harvest.post_harvest: Grade and store in cool conditions.

stages.name: Fruit development & harvest
stages.activities: Maintain moisture and harvest at maturity.

top_dressing: Split N and K monthly after establishment.

irrigation.notes: Avoid waterlogging to prevent root diseases.

pests.prevention: Rogue infected plants and maintain clean nursery.

harvest.post_harvest: Handle gently and avoid latex stains.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest when pods dry and brown.

stage_wise: Flowering/pod filling: One irrigation if needed.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry and thresh carefully.

top_dressing: Apply N and K at flowering and fruit set.

irrigation.notes: Avoid water stress to reduce fruit cracking.

pests.prevention: Canopy management and avoid overhead irrigation.

harvest.post_harvest: Handle carefully to avoid rind damage.

stages.name: Land preparation
stages.activities: Puddling, leveling, bunding, and nursery prep.

irrigation.frequency: Shallow flooding or alternate wetting and drying.
irrigation.notes: Most sensitive to stress at flowering and grain filling.

pests.prevention: Resistant varieties and balanced nitrogen use.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry grain to 13-14% moisture before storage.

top_dressing: Usually not required; inoculate with Rhizobium.

harvest.post_harvest: Dry to about 12% moisture.

pests.prevention: Use healthy seed cane and field sanitation.

harvest.post_harvest: Harvest at right maturity and transport quickly.

stages.name: Maturity & harvest
stages.activities: Harvest when leaves yellow and dry.

top_dressing: Split N and K at 60 and 120 days.

irrigation.notes: Avoid waterlogging to prevent rhizome rot.

pests.prevention: Seed rhizome treatment and proper drainage.

harvest.post_harvest: Boil, dry, and polish.

fertilizer.basal: Balanced NPK as per crop and soil test.
top_dressing: Split N and K at vegetative and fruiting stages.

irrigation.notes: Avoid water stress to reduce blossom drop.

harvest.post_harvest: Cool quickly and handle gently.

stages.name: Fruit development & harvest
stages.activities: Maintain moisture and harvest at maturity.

harvest.indicators: Tendril dry and dull sound on tapping.
harvest.post_harvest: Harvest in cool hours and avoid sun exposure.
